short_description: HYDRATION MIX: A great-tasting, non-GMO electrolyte drink mix that delivers hydration faster than water alone.

GREAT TASTE: Four delicious flavors in one pack. Lime is zesty and bright, with a punch of citrus flavor. Passion Fruit has notes of honey, melon and berry flavor. Strawberry has the classic strawberry flavor topped with notes of whipped cream. Tropical Punch has tangy notes of tangerine, pineapple and cherry flavors.
SCIENCE-BACKED FORMULA: Powered by LIV HYDRASCIENCE, Liquid I.V. is designed with an optimized ratio of electrolytes and clinically tested nutrients.

EXTRAORDINARY HYDRATION: Hydration Multiplier has 3x the electrolytes of the leading sports drink, and 8 vitamins and nutrients. It contains 100% of the daily value of 4 B vitamins: B3, B5, B6 and B12. Gluten-free, soy-free, and dairy-free.
CONVENIENCE: Single-serving, travel-friendly packets are easy to enjoy on the go. Pour one easy-to-open packet into 16 oz of water, mix or shake, and hydrate.
HYDRATION AID: Since 2015, we have donated over 55 million servings of Liquid I.V. to those in need around the globe, and donate over 1% of our revenue to our Impact programs.

name: Venture Pal High Sodium Electrolyte Powder Packets | Sugar Free Hydration Drink Mix with Sodium, Potassium, Magnesium & Vitamins | Zero Calorie | Keto, Vegan & Paleo Friendly | 16 Sticks
short_description: REAL SALT POWER – Formulated with a naturally salty flavor that fuels true hydration. Venture Pal’s high-sodium electrolyte drink mix helps your body rehydrate and rebalance quickly after sweating or intense workouts—because hydration needs salt.

SCIENCE-INSPIRED FORMULA – Research suggests that heavy sweaters and hard-training athletes may need additional sodium each day. Our balanced blend of sodium, potassium, and magnesium supports hydration and endurance when you need it most.
CLEAN & SIMPLE INGREDIENTS – Zero calories and sugar-free, made without artificial colors or flavors. Suitable for vegan, keto, paleo, gluten-free, soy-free, dairy-free, and non-GMO lifestyles.

EASY TO MIX, REFRESHINGLY SALTY – Add one stick to 16–32 oz of water to find your taste. Single serve, travel friendly sticks for wherever you go - whether facing thirst, fatigue, dry skin, POTS or muscle cramps. (Not recommended for low-sodium diets.)

WHY CHOOSE VENTURE PAL? – Backed by scientific validation and third-party testing, Venture Pal delivers clean, reliable hydration. If it’s not everything you hoped for—taste or otherwise—just let us know. We’ll make it right with a no-return refund, even if you’ve already tried it.
